department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) for compressed and liquefied gases on an as and when required basis for operation of laboratory instruments.
description: Compressed and liquefied gases for laboratory instruments.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4348678923
* **Reference Number:** WS4348678923-Doc4518134735
* **Publication Date:** 2024-04-02
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-25 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-12

#### Tender Details

This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply of compressed and liquefied gases on an as-and-when-required basis for the operation of laboratory instruments. The tender is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency's Science and Engineering Directorate.

#### Tender Specifications

* **UNSPSC Codes:**
	+ 12141903 - Nitrogen N
	+ 12141904 - Oxygen O
	+ 12142005 - Helium gas He
	+ 12142104 - Carbon dioxide gas CO2
* **Trade Agreements Applicable:**
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Jackson Hiltz
* **Contact Email:** jackson.hiltz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19283629?extsite=MTkyODM2MjlfQU4wMTQ4N
